New Records: Rilee Rossouw scored the first century of T20 World Cup 2022
Rossouw's knock consisted of seven boundaries and eight sixes
Rossouw reached the three figure mark from just 52 balls
Rossouw became the second player to score back-to-back hundreds in T20Is
Key Match Events: South Africa won the toss and elected to bat first
Temba Bavuma was dismissed in the first over for just two runs
Rossouw and Quinton de Kock put on 163 runs, which is the highest partnership in the history of the T20 World Cup
De Kock was finally dismissed by Afif Hossain for 63 runs from 38 balls
South Africa ended up scoring 205 runs in their allotted 20 overs for the loss of five wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Quinton de Kock said that it was a treat to watch Rilee Rossouw's knock
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Proteas, however, suffered an early setback as skipper Temba Bavuma was dismissed in the first over for just two runs
